item.title: Using Processing from Scala
item.description: Processing is a flexible software sketchbook and a language for learning how to code within the context of the visual arts. From Processing.org I had always wanted to play with Processing (after leafing through The Processing HandbookÂ and Visualizing Data some years ago). My general dislike for Java or the JVM made me just play a very short amount of time with processing.js something around 2011 (there was a native processing.
